0.dialouge:
Hurry up mom!~
We're nearly out of the cave.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge:
Be careful Klay!~ The frost bloom season hasn't ended yet.~
You wouldn't want to run into a flare would you?
1.speaker: Mom

2.dialouge:
It's alright mom!~
I've been around here before.
2.speaker: Klay

0.dialouge: What did I tell you Klay?
0.speaker: Mom

0.dialouge: Be more careful next time okay.
0.speaker: Mom

1.dialouge: Oh don't worry mom, it's just a scratch.
1.speaker: Klay

2.dialouge: It's just a scrath this time Klay.~ You could've gotten really hurt.
2.speaker: Mom

3.dialouge:
Alright...~ alright...~ I'll be more be careful.~
Happy now?
3.speaker: Klay

3.dialouge: I found this spot all on my own!
3.speaker: Klay

6.dialouge: What are those bumps over there.
6.speaker: Klay

8.dialouge: Mountains...~Is that what we are on.
8.speaker: Klay

9.dialouge:
Not quite.~
We are on the Pillar Klay.
9.speaker: Mom

11.dialouge: So can I go to those mountains someday?
11.speaker: Klay

12.dialouge: ...~ I think that may be difficult.
12.speaker: Mom

13.dialouge: We haven't even explored the entire Pillar yet after all.
13.speaker: Mom

14.dialouge: Then I'll just explore the entire Pillar first!
14.speaker: Klay

15.dialouge: Heh...~ You'll have to become a Vanguard to do that..
15.speaker: Mom

16.dialouge: A Vanguard?~ Is that what you and dad where?
16.speaker: Klay

17.dialouge: Yes.~ And he was one of the best as well.
17.speaker: Mom

19.dialouge:
...~
So aside from exploration, what does the Vanguard actually do?
19.speaker: Klay

20.dialouge:
They do a lot of things Klay.~
But if I had to boil it down~ I'd say that they venture onto unknown parts of the Pillar and rescue those who may be trapped by the Pillar's shifting.
20.speaker: Mom

21.dialouge: They are the first responders to disaster~ and the ones we send to the unknown.
21.speaker: Mom

22.dialouge: Awesome!~ Now I really want to be a member of the Vanguard.
22.speaker: Klay

23.dialouge: Heh...~ You didn't even know what they did a minute ago.
23.speaker: Mom

25.dialouge: I'll join the Vanguard someday.~ I know it.
25.speaker: Klay
